name: @i-luv-pho/browsr
description: Terminal AI builder - Canva competitor that outputs real HTML/CSS/JS

scripts.build: esbuild src/cli/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/browsr.mjs --packages=external && printf '\x23\x21/usr/bin/env node\n' | cat - dist/browsr.mjs > dist/temp.mjs && mv dist/temp.mjs dist/browsr.mjs && chmod +x dist/browsr.mjs
